tool.name: write_file
tool.description:
Tool for writing to a file in the virtual filesystem. This creates or overwrites files that can be shared between agents and accessed later in the session.
The virtual filesystem is isolated per session and provides a safe environment for file operations without affecting the real filesystem.
Use this tool when you need to: - Create new files with content - Save generated code, documents, or data - Store intermediate results for later use - Share information between different agents

parameters.param: Name of the file to create or overwrite
Content to write to the file
